Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44
The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
encouraged \encouraged\ adj. made to feel more courage, hope, or optimism.
Syn: bucked up(predicate). [WordNet 1.5]
encouraged adj : inspired with confidence; "felt bucked up by his success" [syn: {bucked up(p)}]
